input_text:
Job Title: Digital Marketing Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
BASIC PURPOSE: To keep social media and digital advertising channels

current and impactful

Essential Duties And Responsibilities

The Digital Marketing Manager is responsible for working within digital marketing platforms to:

Achieve the tactical execution of strategic campaigns and initiatives as defined by the Content and Product Marketing teamsManage the day-to-day operations of digital advertising and social channels, including:Demandbase/Account-Based Marketing (ABM)SEM (Google Ads and Microsoft Advertising)Paid and Organic Social (LinkedIn)Create and update engaging content
Other Duties And Responsibilities

This position will be responsible for coordinating channel activities with stakeholders across Marketing. This role’s ongoing activities include:

Developing digital marking strategies that drive lead generation, customer acquisition, and brand perceptionCreating engaging digital content, ensuring alignment with marketing and brand objectivesManaging digital agency relationshipsKeyword deployment and optimizationCampaign and ad group structure managementTracking alignment, bid optimizationEnsuring opt-in to relevant betasIntegration with other platformsReporting and insight generation 

Qualifications And Skills Needed

Applicants must have a proven track record of successfully managing digital marketing campaigns across the requisite platforms, including specific, impactful examples of optimization and business results driven through each. Candidates should have a demonstrated aptitude for:

Collaborative teamwork across multiple stakeholdersForesight towards the evolution of digital platform enhancements, including audience alignment and segmentation, orchestration across platforms, and attribution across channelsFlexibility in adapting tactics to shifting prioritiesData analysis, especially with tools like Google AnalyticsAccount-based marketing with Demandbase Paid advertising with experience managing campaigns across Google and LinkedIn Ads 

Education

Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field, such as Marketing, Informatics, or Communication, is preferred, but not required.

Experience

Five years of hands-on digital marketing experience required. Your work history must include concrete examples of working in digital advertising platforms. Agency experience preferred.

The Department Head has the discretion to hire personnel with a combination of experience and education, which may vary from the above listed qualifications.

EEO Statement

Clario is an equal opportunity employer. Clario evaluates qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, disability/handicap status, or any other legally protected characteristic.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
